subject: Re: Samba 4 TP5 plans
body:
Rod Smith wrote:
> On Monday 14 May 2007 08:05, Jelmer Vernooij  wrote:
> 
>> As discussed at SambaXP, we'd like to get the ball for TP5 rolling and
>> release it in the next few weeks.
> 
> Do you have any idea of how close TP5 will be to entering beta and final 
> release states? (I'm an author who writes about open source, including Samba, 
> so this is important to me.) I realize you can't provide exact dates, but 
> weeks vs. months vs. a year or more would be helpful to me. Thanks.
We plan on doing a first alpha soon (hopefully a 3 months or so). At 
that point, more user-visible things (such as configuration file 
formats, schema's, etc) will be less prone to big changes than currently.

Cheers,

Jelmer
